info.title: Pooled Capacity
info.description: This service is based on OData V4 protocol and can be consumed in Fiori apps and on other user interfaces. It enables you to create, read and update pooled capacity. The service contains pooled capacity header, pooled capacity description, pooled capacity interval and pooled capacity shift details.

x-sap-shortText: Manage pooled capacities using this synchronous inbound service

values.text: [ Make-to-Stock Production - Discrete Manufacturing(BJ5)](https://me.sap.com/processnavigator/SolP/BJ5 " Link To BP ")
